summary: Adjusts food to be more useful and worth carrying around
descriptionHtml:
Ever feel like the vanilla food settings were just too... bland? I mean, a whole Apple Pie, and all you get is 10 health restored?

I aim to change that with this mod.

For the most part, I\'m just sticking with the direction Bethesda themselves took with food - it should not replace health/stamina/magic potions, but should also provide a benefit worthy enough to sacrifice the carry weight for it.

This breaks down to adding those lovely \"Regenerate 1 Stamina per second for 720 seconds\" effects and the like to pretty much every form of \"prepared\" food (so Apples are still a measly few HP, but an Apple Pie will now fortify your Magicka by 50 and your Magicka Rate by 2 per second for 2 minutes).

I had a full list here, but in the interests of brevity, I\'ll include it in a readme for the next release.

NOW HEARTHFIRE COMPLIANT!  Take a look!  Changes not listed here, but plenty of good things.  Be sure to bring a jug of milk along the next time you tee off against a Chaurus ^_~


---==Compatibilities==----
Any survival mods that require you to eat food should be compatible with this mod, as I haven\'t changed any of the formIDs or other data; just the actual effect of the food.

I deliberately didn\'t touch the drinks so that this mod can be compatible with most of the Alcoholism/Drunk mods out there.

If you come across any issues, let me know! I\'ve rather limited ability, but I\'ll do what I can or find someone to help.


---==Version History==----
v1.0 (12/21/2012) - Yay! The world didn\'t end! Also, initial release!

v1.5 (1/26/2013) - Second release, with Hearthfire Support.
author: Deostades
